ToScancode(InputKey)

Returns the corresponding SDL.SDL_Scancode for a given InputKey.

public static SDL_Scancode ToScancode(this InputKey inputKey)

Parameters

inputKey InputKey

Should be a keyboard key.

Returns

SDL_Scancode

The corresponding SDL.SDL_Scancode if the InputKey is valid. SDL.SDL_Scancode.SDL_SCANCODE_UNKNOWN otherwise.

TryGetTouchName(SDL_TouchFingerEvent, out string?)

Gets the name of the touch device for this SDL.SDL_TouchFingerEvent.

public static bool TryGetTouchName(this SDL_TouchFingerEvent e, out string? name)

Parameters

e SDL_TouchFingerEvent
name string

Returns

bool

Remarks

On Windows, this will return "touch" for touchscreen events or "pen" for pen/tablet events.
